attributes.action: Reduce the cost of living in the UK or increase our pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the constant increases in taxes, fuel costs, utilities bills, Mortgages and general inflation it has become almost impossible to survive and live at a very basic standard of living.  Although everything is going up in cost, salaries do not reflect these rises and people are getting into debt and poverty.  Enough is enough where is all the money going?

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=increase+wage&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=cost+of+living+wage&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
